messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Report

Thanks to the tireless efforts of our security and intelligence divisions, there are currently no credible threats to Earth Death-trap Omega. All station construction projects have been authorized. Have a secure shift!

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: NANOTRASEN WAS WRONG! HAHA! YOUR CAPTAIN AND HOS ARE DEAD!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Service Hallway.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.
